result.html: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an ċogaiḋ ḟuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.

result.eng: Here in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ga: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.orig: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.html: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ponchtml: Anseo i Nua-Eaḃrac ḃí criṫ beag talún againn an tseaċtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.

result.eng: Apart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
result.ga: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhanna
result.orig: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhanna
result.html: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhannaApart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
result.ponchtml: Díomaite de ċorrḃlag fánaċ is beag nuaẛonrú a ḋéantar ar ḟorṁór na suíoṁannaApart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.

result.eng: That's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ga: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.orig: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.html: Sin an rud a thug an bealach méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ponchtml: Sin an rud a ṫug an bealaċ méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.

result.eng: Come here and take a look at her.
result.ga: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.orig: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.html: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ anseo go ḃfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.

result.eng: That's why I came here.
result.ga: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealach
result.orig: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealach
result.html: Ba é sin mo ghnóithe an bealachThat's why I came here.
result.ponchtml: Ba é sin mo ġnóiṫe an bealaċThat's why I came here.
